Pronunciation:
b r\ i . j A . n i
b r\ j A . n i
Definition: A popular South Asian dish made with spices, rice, and meat or vegetables. In Singapore, it is commonly served with a side of acar (pickled vegetables) or papadum (a crispy, thin Indian flatbread).
Example: 1. Let's go eat briyani for lunch today, I know a good spot in Little India.
